title: AppClientEditFormBody
description: This is the request body used by the HTML form submission for editing new OAuth2 Clients (credentials)

allowClientCredentials.description: Can the client can use the 'client_credentials' flow

allowAuthorizationCode.description: Can the client can use the 'authorization_code' flow

allowAuthorizationChallenge.description: Can the client can use the OAuth 2.0 for First Party Applications flow

allowImplicit.description: Can the client can use the deprecated 'implicit' flow

allowRefreshToken.description: Is the client allowed to refresh tokens

allowPassword.description: Can the client can use the 'password' flow flow

redirectUris.description: List of redirect uris for the authorization_code and implicit flows.

requirePkce.description: Require 'Proof of Key Code Exchange' for authorization_code flow. If not set, PKCE is supported but not enforced.
